groupTemplateList.title: Filtering a dataset
groupTemplateList.description: Filters allows a user to refine the data they want to display in a large dataset by removing any items that do not match their criteria.

groupTemplateList.title: Selecting multiple options
groupTemplateList.description: Multi-select is a commonly used design pattern that allows users to select multiple options from a list. This pattern is used in various contexts such as search filters, form fields, and more.
